meta_description: Located in the heart of the University of Wisconsin–Madison campus, the Chazen Museum of Art is home to the second-largest collection of art in Wisconsin. Collections and exhibitions are complemented with events and educational programming for the public.
hours_text:
Located in the center of the UW campus, the Chazen is free and open to the public. Public parking lots are available nearby—The [Frances Street Campus Garage](https://www.cityofmadison.com/parking-utility/garages-lots/state-street-campus-garage) is closest, the Chazen is on several [Madison Metro](https://www.cityofmadison.com/metro) bus routes, and [BCycle](https://madison.bcycle.com/) stations are nearby. Accessible parking [stalls](https://transportation.wisc.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/28/2024/11/TS_UW_Madison_Accessible_Parking_Map_11x17_RGB_20241126.pdf) are in front of the museum off University Avenue and [other locations](https://transportation.wisc.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/28/2024/11/TS_UW_Madison_Accessible_Parking_Map_11x17_RGB_20241126.pdf) nearby. [Contact us to learn more](https://chazen.wisc.edu/contact-us/).

## Address

Chazen Museum of Art  
750 University Avenue  
Madison, WI 53706

## Museum Hours

Monday–Friday, 10 a.m.–7 p.m.  
Saturday–Sunday 11 a.m.–5 p.m.  
The website is open 24/7.

• Closed for [campus holidays](https://secfac.wisc.edu/academic-calendar/#2024-2025)

• Galleries in the Elvehjem building remain closed during renovation.

## Chazen Café

Mon–Wed, 8:30 a.m.–5:30 p.m.  
Thu–Fri, 8:30 a.m.–7 p.m.  
Sat–Sun, 11 a.m.–4:30 p.m.

• Closed for [campus holidays](https://secfac.wisc.edu/academic-calendar/#2024-2025)

• [Café hours](https://union.wisc.edu/dine/find-food-and-drink/chazen-cafe/) vary during university breaks

collections_text:
## Welcome to the Chazen Museum of Art

**The museum will be open to the public on January 19, 2026, Martin Luther King, Jr. Day.** University offices are [closed](https://today.wisc.edu/events/day/2026-01-19) in observance of the [federal holiday](https://www.congress.gov/crs_external_products/R/HTML/R44339.html), however the museum will be open 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.

## Chazen Café and Shop

[Learn More](https://chazen.wisc.edu/visit/)

## Podcast: Meet Me at the Chazen

[listen](https://chazen.wisc.edu/press-room/publications/meet-me-at-chazen/)

## Chazen News

[read the latest](https://chazen.wisc.edu/press-room/)

## Exhibitions

Traveling | Sep 19, 2025–Mar 14, 2026

###  [_Petah Coyne: How Much A Heart Can Hold_ at the Lowe Art Museum](https://chazen.wisc.edu/exhibitions/petah-coyne-how-much-a-heart-can-hold-at-the-lowe-art-museum/)

Upcoming | Apr 10–May 22, 2026

###  [Panczenko MFA Prize Exhibition: Anne E. Stoner](https://chazen.wisc.edu/exhibitions/panczenko-mfa-prize-exhibition-anne-e-stoner/)
